entries.already_search: You already searched the lair and doubt you could find anything else worth of interest.
entries.altruism_already_open: Someone else is already inspecting that area.
entries.altruism_explosion_damage: You have taken some damage from your proximity to the explosion.
entries.altruism_explosive_removed: You have removed the explosives from the rock crevice and turned off the timer.
entries.altruism_explosive_set: You have placed the explosives into the rock crevice and set the timer to TEN SECONDS.
entries.altruism_got_object: You found a pack of timed explosives! The crate has fallen apart due to years of deterioration.
entries.altruism_inv_full: You did not receive the Mark of Altruism item because your inventory is full. Seek out the Hermit to acquire that which you are owed.
entries.altruism_inventory_full: You found something in the crate, but your inventory is full. Make some room and search again.
entries.altruism_no_reason: You can't think of a good reason to put this item there.
entries.altruism_not_wise_examine: It would probably not be wise to inspect that area now.
entries.altruism_npc_farewell: Thank you so much for helping us. We'll go straight home from here, I promise!
entries.altruism_null_object: You found something in the crate, but couldn't get it for some reason. You might want to try again.
entries.altruism_quest_fail: MISSION FAILED: You were not successful in rescuing the farmer's wife and daughter.
entries.altruism_quest_success: MISSION SUCCESS: You have rescued the farmer's wife and daughter!
entries.courage_already_have_mark: You already have the Mark of Courage.
entries.courage_notice_object: As the creature falls, you notice an object glittering on its corpse.
entries.enter: You enter what seems to be a rancher's house. It appears to be sensibly decorated and pleasant and the aroma of freshly baked goods greets you. In the distance, you can hear faint, but frantic, murmuring. You should investigate.
entries.failed: Quest Failed: The pirates have escaped! To restart, seek out the pirate leader in the wilderness of Tatooine.
entries.hero_inv_full: You did not receive the Mark of the Hero item because your inventory is full. Speak to the Hermit again to acquire that which you are owed.
entries.honor_inv_full: You did not receive the Mark of Honor item because your inventory is full. Seek out the Hermit to acquire that which you are owed.
entries.intellect_inv_full: You did not receive the Mark of Intellect item because your inventory is full. Seek out the Hermit to acquire that which you are owed.
entries.inventory: Your inventory is full and can't carry anymore items.
entries.receive: You pick through the twigs and dirt and find an abandoned skull.
entries.reset: Resetting Quest: Check objvars on your character to guarantee correct testing. Additionally, be sure to review documentation on the Hero of Tatooine quest.
entries.restart: Restarting Quest: The seven minute time limit has been reached. The quest has been restarted for other players to enjoy.
entries.restore_msg: Your Mark of the Hero has restored some life to you...
entries.restore_not_dead: That special ability will have no effect while you are alive.
entries.restore_not_equipped: You must be wearing the ring to use that special ability.
entries.restore_not_yet: You cannot use this special ability for %TO
entries.success: Quest completed: Mark of Honor received!
